entry.title: George Custer / Miss Piggy
entry.content:

This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry for the delayed delete here. This is treating Civil War figures as ancient history suitable for silly fun and... that's not the moment we're in right now. -- LobsterMitten

entry.title: Baby Glenn Gould
entry.content:
Post 188403 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry for the late delete on this. It's pretty thin to begin with, which would be ok if it were bringing the intended lighthearted fun (which is why we've let it ride for this long) -- but having given it a chance here, the joke isn't really working for people, so I'm going to pull it. -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 188403 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry for the late delete on this. It's pretty thin to begin with, which would be ok if it were bringing the intended lighthearted fun (which is why we've let it ride for this long) -- but having given it a chance here, the joke isn't really working for people, so I'm going to pull it. -- LobsterMitten
